description: This file contains unit tests for Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) enforcement in a FastAPI application, using pytest. It defines a stub FastAPI app with protected endpoints, authentication helpers, and test cases verifying access controls.

classes.name: AuthContext
classes.description: Immutable dataclass representing authentication context, including user subject and roles.

methods.name: _auth_from_token
methods.description: Stub function to authenticate a token and return corresponding auth context with roles.

methods.name: require_roles
methods.description: Factory function creating a dependency that enforces presence of at least one required role.

methods.name: _build_stub_app
methods.description: Creates a minimal FastAPI application with an RBAC-protected endpoint '/admin/users'.

methods.name: client
methods.description: Pytest fixture providing a test client for the stub FastAPI app.

methods.name: test_users_list_denies_unauthenticated
methods.description: Test case verifying that the '/admin/users' endpoint denies access without authentication (returns 401).

methods.name: test_users_list_denies_non_admin_role
methods.description: Test case verifying that non-admin roles receive a 403 Forbidden response.

methods.name: test_users_list_allows_admin_role
methods.description: Test case verifying that an authenticated user with Admin role is allowed access (returns 200).
